pr_title: CAMEL-14514: Improve performance of Camel Google Pub/Sub

timeline.author: oscerd

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
CS: Fix all imports
CAMEL-14762: Regen and fixed some components had invalid setter/getter pairs
CAMEL-14934: (Batch 3) Improve Component, Language, Data format, etc. descriptions in Camel Catalog
CAMEL-14801: First patch to change from label to category field and refine some of the categories (#3839)
[CAMEL-14578] Reformat
CAMEL-15861: Add the capability to provide a custom serializer to GooglePubSubProducer (#4619)
CAMEL-16022: Add message ordering to Google PubSub (#4877)
CAMEL-16273 - Camel-google-* cloud components: Make the serviceAccountKey explicitly configurable - Camel-google-pubsub
Google Pubsub: Added note about authentication in documentation
CAMEL-16273 - Camel-google-* cloud components: Make the serviceAccountKey explicitly configurable - Camel-google-pubsub, mark service account key as required
CAMEL-16273 - Camel-google-* cloud components: Make the serviceAccountKey explicitly configurable - Camel-google-pubsub - Improved endpoint options description
CAMEL-16273 - Camel-google-* cloud components: Make the serviceAccountKey explicitly configurable - Camel-google-pubsub - Improved endpoint options description
CAMEL-16322 - Have a middle folder for google components

timeline.body: There is some API on CamelContext via ExecutorServiceStrategy that can shutdown thread pools graceful and is recommened to use
timeline.bodyText: There is some API on CamelContext via ExecutorServiceStrategy that can shutdown thread pools graceful and is recommened to use
timeline.bodyHTML: There is some API on CamelContext via ExecutorServiceStrategy that can shutdown thread pools graceful and is recommened to use
timeline.author: davsclaus

replies.bodyText:
This is cleanup of the cached publisher with no associated thread pool.
If you are referring to the consumer thread pool. I've changed that to use the graceful shutdown: https://github.com/apache/camel/pull/3551/files#diff-8becc735c075d032757f24805f234520R70
replies.author: alvinkwekel

timeline.body: These are hardcoded values, why these values? And would it make sense for users to be able to cofigure them
timeline.bodyText: These are hardcoded values, why these values? And would it make sense for users to be able to cofigure them
timeline.bodyHTML: These are hardcoded values, why these values? And would it make sense for users to be able to cofigure them
timeline.author: davsclaus

replies.bodyText: Its possible better to have such cache on the component so there is a single cache for all endpoints. And also shutdown the cache whe the componet stop
replies.author: davsclaus

replies.bodyText: I've moved the cache to the component and made the values configurable.
replies.author: alvinkwekel

timeline.message:
CAMEL-14514: Improve performance of Camel Google Pub/Sub

Use google-cloud-pubsub library
Asynchronous pull
Cache producers
CAMEL-14514: Private constructor to constants class
CAMEL-14514: Cleanup and make imports explicit
CAMEL-14514: Null check in removal listener
CAMEL-14514: Add class licence headers
CAMEL-14514: Correct test properties
CAMEL-14514: Update documentation
CAMEL-14514: Imports ordering
CAMEL-14514: Update Karaf feature
fixup! CAMEL-14514: Update Karaf feature

CAMEL-14514: Explicitly manage GRPC dependencies

To avoid conflicts between the GRPC component and Google Pub/Sub component
CAMEL-14514: Call configureConsumer
CAMEL-14514: Move producer cache from endpoint to component and make it configurable
CAMEL-14514: Don't wrap OSGi bundles
CAMEL-14514: Graceful shutdown consumer thread pool
CAMEL-14514: Unnecessary set parallel count to default
CAMEL-14514: Update Google Guava
CAMEL-14514: Generated documentation update
CAMEL-14514: Handle null message attributes
fixup! CAMEL-14514: Handle null message attributes

CAMEL-14514: Draft implementation of configurable endpoint

To use with local Pub/Sub emulator
CAMEL-14514: Rename async acknowledge
CAMEL-14514: Add sync pull
CAMEL-14514: Ignore exceptions when creating test topics and subscriptions
CAMEL-14514: Integration test with synchronous pull to avoid issues
CAMEL-14514: Minor code formatting
CAMEL-14514: Serialize payload
CAMEL-14514: Correct working of grouped exchange
CAMEL-14514: Correct source check issues
CAMEL-14514: Pass subscription name when acknowledging synchronously
CAMEL-14514: Don't reuse subscriber stub
CAMEL-14514: Stop all async subscribers on consumer stop
CAMEL-14514: Remove unused test properties
CAMEL-14514: Revert parent Google guava version to 19.0
CAMEL-14514: Acknowledge test with synchronous pull
CAMEL-14514: Don't use StringUtils
CAMEL-14514: Synchronous pull boolean default value
CAMEL-14514: Properly shutdown test resources
fixup! CAMEL-14514: Revert parent Google guava version to 19.0
CAMEL-14514: Explicit Google PubSub Guava version property
